author: Nbc News
title: Ohio to begin reopening on May 1, governor announces
description: Gov. Mike DeWine announced on Thursday his intention to "start opening Ohio back up," saying the first phase of the planned reopening would begin on May 1.
content:
Ohio to begin reopening on May 1, governor announces
Gov. Mike DeWine announced on Thursday his intention to "start opening Ohio back up," saying the first phase of the planned reopening would begin on May 1.
